title: [minor bug] tf1.0+ compatibility script doesn't handle old batch_matmul arguments
body_html:
tf 1.0 merges batch_matmul into matmul, but the compatibility script forgot to rename the arguments for batch_matmul

what is needed is:
adj_x --> transpose_a
adj_y --> transpose_b

I would be happy to write a quick PR.

References:

https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.12/api_docs/python/

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/matmul
body_text:
tf 1.0 merges batch_matmul into matmul, but the compatibility script forgot to rename the arguments for batch_matmul
what is needed is:
adj_x --> transpose_a
adj_y --> transpose_b
I would be happy to write a quick PR.

body:
tf 1.0 merges `batch_matmul` into `matmul`, but the compatibility script forgot to rename the arguments for `batch_matmul`

what is needed is: 
`adj_x` --> `transpose_a`
`adj_y` --> `transpose_b`

I would be happy to write a quick PR.

References:

https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.12/api_docs/python/

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/matmul
